iteration2

Interface PopInventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Iteration2PopInventory

    public interface PopInventory
    The Interface PopInventory. Classes which implements PopInventory will be able to manage the amount of pop in the machine, which rack it is stored in and the respective cost all keyed off the button which corresponds to that pop

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean dispense(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb)
      Dispense pop from the vending machine for given selection button.

    • Method Detail

      • getPopInfo

        Iteration2PopInventory.PopInfo getPopInfo(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb)
        Gets the pop info.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        Returns:
        the popInfo which has methods for returning the cost, location and amount

      • getCost

        int getCost(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb)
        Gets the cost.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        Returns:
        the cost of the corresponding pop

      • getStock

        int getStock(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb)
        Gets the stock.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        Returns:
        the amount of stock of the corresponding pop

      • setCost

        void setCost(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb,
           int newCost)
        Sets the cost.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        newCost - the new cost for the corresponding pop

      • setStock

        void setStock(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb,
            int newStock)
        Sets the stock.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        newStock - the new amount of stock for the corresponding pop

      • hasPop

        boolean hasPop(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb)
        Checks for pop.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        Returns:
        true, if the amount of pop is equal to or greater than 1. false otherwise

      • dispense

        boolean dispense(com.vendingmachinesareus.SelectionButton sb)
        Dispense pop from the vending machine for given selection button.
        Parameters:
        sb - the selection button to be used as a key
        Returns:
        true, if successful, false otherwise
